title: Stormi Webster wore a mini version of one of Kylie Jenner's most iconic outfits for Halloween
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Stormi Webster just wore a miniature version of the purple feathered dress and wig Kylie Jenner wore to the Met Gala earlier this year.

Naturally, she looked adorable in the iconic look.

Halloween may well be cancelled now, since no-one is ever going to beat Stormi Webster's costume.

The 18-month-old just channelled her mum Kylie Jenner at the Met Gala 2019 in a purple beaded dress, complete with feather boa and straight purple wig. And if that description sounds adorable to you, wait until you see the pictures.

Kylie shared two pictures and a video (scroll through for ultimate cuteness), captioning it: "My baby!!!!!!!! 💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜 i cant handle this!!!!"

You and me both, Kylie.

The 22-year-old has had quite the epic Halloweekend, actually. First, she shared pictures of herself showering in a leather dress. Not entirely sure if this was a costume or just Kylie, but it was very goth-chic regardless.

Then she channelled Madonna at the 2003 VMAs, aka the year that the singer famously kissed Britney Spears and Christina Aguilera on stage at the awards show. And, in true Kylie style, she was ever-dedicated to her outfit with a mic, top hat, and blonde wig. She also had her BFF Stassie Karanikolaou dressed at Britney Spears, and the two filmed a little tribute to the pop stars' iconic performance by dancing around to "Like a Virgin" and kissing:

Note to self: Must step-up this year's Halloween costume.

Follow Abbi on Instagram.

description: I CAN'T DEAL with the cuteness
